L

LineBetween - Class in com.sulfurengine.behaviorscripts
The LineBetween script creates a line between two entities using a LineRenderer component.
LineBetween(Entity, Entity) - Constructor for class com.sulfurengine.behaviorscripts.LineBetween
Constructs a new LineBetween script with two entities.
LineRenderer - Class in com.sulfurengine.renderer
The LineRenderer class renders a line in the game world.
LineRenderer(Vec2) - Constructor for class com.sulfurengine.renderer.LineRenderer
Constructs a LineRenderer with the given start point only, setting the end point to the start point, using the default color and line width.
LineRenderer(Vec2, Vec2) - Constructor for class com.sulfurengine.renderer.LineRenderer
Constructs a LineRenderer with the given start and end points, using the default color and line width.
LineRenderer(Vec2, Vec2, Color) - Constructor for class com.sulfurengine.renderer.LineRenderer
Constructs a LineRenderer with the given start and end points and color, using the default line width.
LineRenderer(Vec2, Vec2, Color, float) - Constructor for class com.sulfurengine.renderer.LineRenderer
Constructs a LineRenderer with the given start and end points, color, and line width.
lineWidth - Variable in class com.sulfurengine.renderer.LineRenderer
The width of the line.
Log(String) - Static method in class com.sulfurengine.util.Debug
Logs a message to the console if debug mode is enabled.
LogError(String) - Static method in class com.sulfurengine.util.Debug
Logs an error message to the console if debug mode is enabled.
LogErrorf(String, Object...) - Static method in class com.sulfurengine.util.Debug
Logs a formatted error message to the console if debug mode is enabled.
Logf(String, Object...) - Static method in class com.sulfurengine.util.Debug
Logs a formatted message to the console if debug mode is enabled.
